      • makeObject

        public java.lang.Long makeObject(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                          throws DataFault
        Description copied from interface: ResultMapper
        Convert a ResultSet into a domain object. The ResultSet should already be positioned at the correct starting Row to start creating the object It is legal for this method to return null to indicate the ResultSet represents an invalid record that should be ignored by the higher levels of the code.
        Specified by:
        makeObject in interface ResultMapper<java.lang.Long>
        Throws:
        DataFault
        Parameters:
        rs - ResultSet or null
        Returns:
        domain object

      • getTarget

        public java.lang.String getTarget()
        Description copied from interface: ResultMapper
        get the target clause of the SQL query. it makes sense to set it here as it has to match what the ResultMapper is expecting
        Specified by:
        getTarget in interface ResultMapper<java.lang.Long>

      • makeDefault

        public java.lang.Long makeDefault()
        Description copied from interface: ResultMapper
        Create a default Object to be returned if no SQL results are generated. If there is no obvious default result then return null. Where there is an obvious result (like a sum=0 or an empty Map) this is less error prone than trying to trap null at the calling level. Note that FilterFinder can optionally check for null results and generate exceptions this still fails but makes it easier to find the problem.
        Specified by:
        makeDefault in interface ResultMapper<java.lang.Long>
        Returns:
        domain object

      • setQualify

        public boolean setQualify(boolean qualify)
        Description copied from interface: ResultMapper
        Request that field names should be qualified with the table name where appropriate. This is for use with joined tables. For some result mappers this does not make sense so this method always returns the same value.
        Specified by:
        setQualify in interface ResultMapper<java.lang.Long>
        Returns:
        previous value of qualify flag

      • getRequiredFilter

        public SQLFilter getRequiredFilter()
        Description copied from interface: ResultMapper
        Get an additional Filter required to make the target string work properly. This is usually used to add an additional join.
        Specified by:
        getRequiredFilter in interface ResultMapper<java.lang.Long>
        Returns:
        null or SQLFilter
